text: Juan Bonilla may refer to: * Juan Bonilla (baseball) (born 1955), Puerto Rican baseball player * Juan Bonilla (bishop) (1636–1696), bishop of Ariano, 1689–96 * Juan Bonilla (writer) (born 1966), Spanish writer * Juan Crisóstomo Bonilla (1835–1884), Mexican general * Juan C. Bonilla (municipality), a municipality in Puebla, Mexico Bonilla, Juan
title: Juan Bonilla
